name: 2024 6th International Conference on Circuits and Systems
content: Publication Options: 1\. Conference Proceedings Accepted and registered full papers will be published by IEEE Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus after conference. 2\. EI Journal Selected excellent papers after extension will be recommended to: >> Journal Electronic Science and Technology (ISSN 1674-862X) Citescore Track: 2.7 Indexing: Ei Compendex, Scopus, INSPEC, CSCD, DOAJ etc., OA on ScienceDirect. >> Computer Technology and Development (ISSN: 1673-629X)
organizers: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China and IEEE Chengdu CEDA
